episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_0200_:
The finest battle facility is finally complete—
just as I envisioned!
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_0400_:
We also had a hand in setting up the
Pasio Towers!
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_0500_:
And we did it by gathering ideas from
experts of each type here on Pasio!
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_0600_:
During the preopening, we also did a trial
run of the facility...
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_0700_:
And yup—it’s definitely the place to go if
you want a challenge!
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_0800_:
Come to think of it, you took the win at the
preopening, didn’t you?
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_0900_:
When it’s the real deal, though, you won’t stand
a chance, Leon!
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_1100_:
And I don’t plan on losing to you
either, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_1200_: Well, that’s the gist of it!
episode_event_pasiotower/4001_1001_1300_:
So go right ahead—sharpen your skills
and give it a try! Hahahahaha!
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_0300_: Sorry to surprise you. Are you practicing?
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_0400_:
Yes, I am! I actually have another
performance coming up, so...
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_0500_:
I see! It’s admirable how dedicated you are
to practicing!
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_0600_:
I wish that fool who handed over the
precious Celestica Flute to someone else
could learn from you...
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_0800_:
I’ve been told that you also play the flute.
Do you enjoy it?
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_1000_:
It feels as if its tones carry to the very ends
of space... Listening to it calms me down.
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_1100_:
Did you know that back in the time
of Hisui...
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_1200_:
special Pokémon would lend you their
powers when you played the flute?
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_1300_:
I have heard about that! Hisui’s
Ride Pokémon, right?
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_1500_:
I also played the flute to get help from a
Legendary Pokémon.
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_1600_:
I think the tunes we play for Pokémon have
a mystical feel to them.
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_1800_:
I really wish I could’ve been there to hear
how that sounded—when you played your
flute for that Legendary Pokémon.
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_2000_:
If you don’t mind, would you like to practice
with me?
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_2100_: Oh, really? I wouldn’t be a bother?
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_2200_:
No, of course not! I’d really appreciate
your guidance!
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_2300_:
Ehehe! I’m actually kind of happy you
asked me!
episode_event_pasiotower/4002_1001_2400_:
OK, then! Let’s play a tune that’ll reach
every corner of Pasio!
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_0200_:
Your vibe changes so much between
working as a model and acting as
Gym Leader, doesn’t it.
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_0300_:
Haha... I’ll admit, when I lose a battle and
get all wound up, I DO get a bit fiery...
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_0400_:
I’m kinda jealous of you, though—you
always seem so calm no matter what.
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_0600_:
The thing is, I’m not really happy about
coming off as too reserved.
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_0700_:
People say I seem hard to approach, and
because of that, I feel kind of distant from
my fans...
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_0800_:
I guess you’ve been working hard on Pasio
to change your image, huh.
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_0900_:
To others, it might look like we’ve got it all
together and everything’s dazzling, but that’s
not always the reality...
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_1000_:
It’s kind of like being backstage at a fashion
show. People imagine it’s all glamorous,
but behind the scenes, it’s actually chaotic.
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1101_1200_: Hello, everyone. Sorry to keep you waiting!
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1101_1500_:
The raging wave!
It’s the master of Water types, Nessa!
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1101_1700_:
The shining beauty! 
The sparkling bolt of electricity, Elesa!
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1101_1800_: All right, you two! Please enter the stage!
episode_event_pasiotower/4003_1001_2100_: Let’s shock everyone with our battling!
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_0600_: (Phew... Looks like I didn’t anger him.)
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_0700_: Well, I wouldn’t say I especially like them...
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_0900_: I am a little envious of their freedom.
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_1100_:
Must be nice living as you please like
Meowth do.
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_1200_:
Is there a particular Meowth you feel
drawn to?
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_1500_:
It’s kind of plain and unremarkable, like me.
Also...
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_1600_:
I like Normal types... When all’s said and
done, simple is best.
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_1800_:
Actually, that Meowth you chose is a bit of
a character.
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_2000_:
If you ever decided to take care of one, it
might be more challenging than you think.
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_2100_: I suppose it wouldn’t be easy...
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_2200_:
I’m just making small talk. No need to take
what I say seriously.
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_2300_: Simple is best—isn’t that what you said?
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_2500_:
Anyway...it’s about time I got some lunch.
I’m guessing you’re on your lunch break too?
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_2800_: Come with me. It’s my treat.
episode_event_pasiotower/4004_1001_2900_: Oh... Thank you. I’d be glad to join you.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_0900_:
I don’t waste my time on weaklings, so I’ll
let you off the hook this time.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_1000_:
Next time, just be smarter about who you
mess with, got it?
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_1400_: Hey, what did you feed him today?
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_1800_: I gave him plenty of Berries. OK?
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2000_:
What, you have a problem with how I take
care of my Pokémon?
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2100_: Well, at least the food part, yeah.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2200_:
Berries have a lot of nutrients and might be
convenient, but they’re not really enough.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2300_: Heh. I usually give him other stuff, too.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2400_: You don’t get to tell me what to do.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2700_: It’s OK once in a while.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2800_:
But food is what gives you energy. You
shouldn’t always rely on ready-made food.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_2900_:
You need to learn how to cook so you can
prepare food based on your Pokémon’s
needs.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_3100_:
You sound like you’ve got a lot of confidence
in your cooking.
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_3300_:
My dream is to become a chef who can
help Pokémon feel better!
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_3400_: I bet your Feraligatr would love my food!
episode_event_pasiotower/4005_1001_3500_:
Heh, you talk big! Fine—I’ll let him try it
then!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_0200_:
The thing is... I reeeally wanna be a
contest idol!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_0300_:
Sooo... Could you teach me a few things,
pleeease?
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_0400_:
Oooh, you’re interested in Pokémon contests?
Yay, that’s amazing!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_0600_:
(Hehe, I might just crack the code on what’s
really making this contest idol so popular!)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_0700_:
Thank you sooo much! Hmm—what should I
ask first?
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_0800_:
Oh, yeah. I’ve been trying to find more ways
to be cute...
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_0900_:
(Ooh, she wants to enter her Pokémon in
the Cute Category!)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_1000_:
(If that’s the case, she should definitely focus
on raising her Pokémon’s Cute condition!)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_1100_: Eating lots of sweet Pokéblocks should help!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_1200_: Those really give a boost to Cuteness!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_1700_:
(So to become a contest idol, I’ve gotta eat
snacks made for Pokémon now?!)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_1800_:
(She seems a bit naive, but I bet she’s been
through a lot behind the scenes...)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_1900_:
(Right—better ask how she trains her voice
next...)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_2000_:
Umm, I also wanted to ask...how do you
practice singing?
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_2200_:
(She must be asking how I train Ali for
contests.)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_2300_:
Lately, I’ve been competing with Lyra’s
Jigglypuff to see who can sing louder!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_2400_:
Huuuuh?! You’re trying to outsing a
Jigglypuff?!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_2500_:
Yup! Oh, but we also battle each other!
And of course, I don’t lose then, either!
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_2700_:
(Huuuuh? Wait—does she ACTUALLY battle
a Pokémon? Like, take hits from it?!
That makes no sense!)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_2900_:
(But... Hmm, hang on a sec. I guess you
DO kinda use your abs when you sing...)
episode_event_pasiotower/4006_1001_3200_:
Maybe I can just continue working on myself
at my own pace...
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_0200_:
Ever since I heard about you, I’ve been
meaning to ask for a battle!
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_0300_: Hah! So you want to challenge me?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_0500_:
The red-hot Gym Leader of Cinnabar Island
will take you on!
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_0700_: Hah! Are you ready to get burned?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_0900_:
It’s time for a Pokémon quiz showdown with
the hotheaded quiz master!
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1000_:
Let’s take turns quizzing each other! Whoever
answers incorrectly first loses.
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1100_:
Having a wide variety of knowledge is key,
of course!
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1200_:
But the ability to come up with many
questions matters too!
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1300_: Lacey! Any objections to the rules?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1500_:
Just to clarify... If I win this quiz
showdown...
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1600_:
(I heard Lacey also uses quizzes in her
own trials...)
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1700_:
(I wonder what she wants from Blaine if
she beats him!)
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1800_: does that mean I can get a Blaine doll?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_1900_:
Of course! I’ll award it to you as proof of
your quiz mastery!
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_2100_:
Question! Which Pokémon is the
Spitfire Pokémon?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_2400_:
Question! In which part of Pikachu’s body
does it store the electricity it generates?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_2500_: The electric sacs in its cheeks!
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_2600_:
Question! Poliwag evolves three times!
True or false?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_2800_:
Question! What part of Venonat’s body 
functions as radar?
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_3300_:
It’s truly spectacular! And to add to the
spectacle...
episode_event_pasiotower/4007_1001_3500_:
Watching you two go all out in this fiery quiz
showdown is making me want to dance!
